The town is home to a 9-screen multiplex Cineworld cinema, Llandudno Junction Leisure Centre, a Tesco supermarket, and a McDonald's, KFC and Pizza Hut restaurant.

Llandudno Junction also has a number of beautiful walks and a fantastic bird sanctuary at RSPB Conwy.

There is a large Arts & Crafts Scrapstore and Recycled Wood (that also sells garden furniture and interesting metal work), which is run by a not-for-profit organisation. It has a craft shop, a scrap store, recycled wood and kids' arts and crafts sessions. This is just off the Weekly News roundabout.

value: content=This pub and restaurant is known locally as the Killer or in Welsh
, as this is where the railway workers would spend their lunch breaks (i.e. killing time).
